content: 2 x 2 satisfying bulkly cables by tin can knits big bold cables and and buttons make sizing finished cowl measures 23 long and 7 tall for a quick stylish knit for you or as a materials perfect gift knit in bulky yarn this cowl makes for a great first cable project yarn 100 yds bulky weight yarn sample shown in sweet fiber merino big twist in sea glass needles us #11 / 8mm or as required to meet gauge ravelry cast on gauge 12 sts & 16 row / 4 in stockinette notions darning needle two 1 5 buttons 2x2 button scarf from tin can knits 1 © tin can knits 2015 www tincanknits com in-depth tutorials excellent support fabulous free patterns join us pattern finishing cast on 22 stitches weave in ends sew buttons on corresponding to buttonholes wet block your scarf knit 6 row wrap up your beautiful gift for someone special buttonhole row k6 work 2 st buttonhole instructions below twice k6 knit 5 row abbreviations row 1 3 7 rs k3 p1 k6 p2 k6 p1 k3 row 2 and all ws row k4 p6 k2 p6 k4 c6f - cable 6 front - slip 3 sts onto cable row 5 k3 p1 c6f p2 c6f p1 k3 needle hold in front of work k3 from lh row 8 as row 2 needle k3 from cable needle work row 1-8 a total of 9 times k - knit lh - left hand knit 8 row p - purl bind off all sts rh - right hand rs - right side 2 stitch buttonhole slip 2 sts pass the first over the st s - stitch es second slip 1 more st pass the first over the second 2 ws - wrong side sts bound off slip 1 st from the rh needle to the lh needle cast on 2 sts to the rh needle how do i find a tutorial on how to cable at www tincanknits com/support html *you are welcome to share this free pattern with friends or use for teaching for further usage info contact tincanknits@gmail com 2x2 button scarf from tin can knits 2 © tin can knits 2015 www tincanknits com in-depth tutorials excellent support fabulous free patterns join us tin can knits in vancouver + edinburgh www tincanknits com pattern name %^*%#$ www tincanknits com
